experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Project: Building a book recommender system for e-commerce website enhancing personalized experience and engagement for users•Implemented model based approach of Collaborative Filtering method using K-Nearest Neighbors to generate the product recommendations•Applied user based filtering to streamline similar users based on past interactions of the purchases done calculating cosine similarity metric•Deployed item based filtering using Matrix Factorization algorithm for more exploratory experience that helps users discover similar items
experience.description_html: Project: Building a book recommender system for e-commerce website enhancing personalized experience and engagement for users•Implemented model based approach of Collaborative Filtering method using K-Nearest Neighbors to generate the product recommendations•Applied user based filtering to streamline similar users based on past interactions of the purchases done calculating cosine similarity metric•Deployed item based filtering using Matrix Factorization algorithm for more exploratory experience that helps users discover similar items

experience.title: Governor
experience.description: Social organisation run by students- Educating underprivileged students in nearby area of IIT kharagpur campus.- Mostly focuses on enhancing extra curricular activities for children to discover their best ones.

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: Improving Process Efficiency of Tele calling operations with CRM•	Methodically examined and analysed the data(appointments, follow up leads, current leads) of calling with current and potential customers.•	Analysed and made efficient changes to improve the process of tele calling operations that ultimately driving sales growth.Prediction of car prices•	Made a slicer model for prediction of car prices using make, model, variant, year, city, registration date etc.
experience.description_html: Improving Process Efficiency of Tele calling operations with CRM• Methodically examined and analysed the data(appointments, follow up leads, current leads) of calling with current and potential customers.• Analysed and made efficient changes to improve the process of tele calling operations that ultimately driving sales growth.Prediction of car prices• Made a slicer model for prediction of car prices using make, model, variant, year, city, registration date etc. <!---->

projects: [{"title":"COVID-19 Impact Assessment","start_date":"May 2024","end_date":"Jun 2024","description":"- Analysing COVID-19 data, a notable correlation was observed between vaccination rates and mortality rates. Increasing vaccination by 10% correlated with a mortality reduction of 18.1% at 6 months and 16.8% at 12 months. - Using SQL, data was analysed to calculate and visualize peak monthly averages for COVID-19 infection rates (highest at 1.54 in March 2020) and maximum monthly vaccination rates (peaking at 4.97 in January 2022) using Tableau Public."},{"title":"Airbnb Listing Insights","start_date":"Mar 2024","end_date":"Apr 2024","description":"- Analysed data patterns and developed a Power BI dashboard for prospective hosts, providing insights into customer pricing preferences, peak sales periods, types of bedrooms, and key business locations. These insights are expected to result in a projected 15% increase in listing occupancy."},{"title":"Titanic: Machine Learning from Disaster - Kaggle","description":"-implemented machine learning tools(random forest classifier model) for the prediction of the data using Pyhton libraries - pandas ,numpy , matplotlib , scikit-learn -comed up with the accuracy of 78.9% to the test data"}]
